channel.title: Commands against owner/coowner & webclient skilltab glitch [PI] 317
channel.description:
Hey im trying to find a piece a code to add to some commands to commands such as ::Jail, ::scare, ::mute, ::ban, etc so they can not be used against the main owner or co owner of an insidiax, trisidiax, or pi server. for ::jail i tried adding if (playerName.equals.ignoreCase("ownername"); c.sendMessage("You cannot jail the owner"); or something like that and it compiled fine but it didnt not work at all so if anyone has an insight as to how to do this it would be appreciated.
Also on my webclient on rswebclients.com my new players all have 99/99 for their skills when in actuality they do not. so if anyone has some information as to how to fix that it will be appreciated, as i have no idea. BTW this is a 317 insidiax/trisidax source thats compatible with PI Thanks in advance

item.title: Commands against owner/coowner & webclient skilltab glitch [PI] 317
item.dc:creator: @david20x6 david20x6
item.description:
@david20x6 wrote:

thanks ill probably try the first code you offered because the second would allow donators & hiddens to do commands on me

Read full topic

item.title: Commands against owner/coowner & webclient skilltab glitch [PI] 317
item.dc:creator: @runeherorsps runeherorsps
item.description:
@runeherorsps wrote:

you will add this in you commands.

if (playerName.equals.ignoreCase("ownername") {
return;
}

or if you want

if c.playerRights >= 3 {
return;
}

Read full topic

@david20x6 wrote:

Hey im trying to find a piece a code to add to some commands to commands such as ::Jail, ::scare, ::mute, ::ban, etc so they can not be used against the main owner or co owner of an insidiax, trisidiax, or pi server. for ::jail i tried adding if (playerName.equals.ignoreCase(“ownername”);
c.sendMessage(“You cannot jail the owner”); or something like that and it compiled fine but it didnt not work at all so if anyone has an insight as to how to do this it would be appreciated.

Also on my webclient on rswebclients.com my new players all have 99/99 for their skills when in actuality they do not. so if anyone has some information as to how to fix that it will be appreciated, as i have no idea.

Thanks in advance
